meanings.meaning_en_US: A hard metal made of iron and carbon, often used in construction.

examples.sentence: The building is supported by a frame of [steel].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這棟大樓由鋼架支持

examples.sentence: They manufacture [steel] products at this factory.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們在這家工廠生產鋼製品

examples.sentence: He sharpened the knife using a [steel].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他用鋼棒磨利了刀子

meanings.meaning_en_US: A representation of the external form of a person or thing in art.

examples.sentence: The [image] of the mountain was breathtaking.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那座山的影像美得令人屏息。

examples.sentence: She created an [image] for her project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她為她的專案創建了一個影像。

examples.sentence: The photographer captured the perfect [image].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 攝影師捕捉到了完美的影像。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A means of healing or restoring to health.

examples.sentence: Scientists are searching for a [cure] for the disease.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 科學家們正在尋找這種疾病的治療方法

examples.sentence: The doctor offered several [cure] options.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 醫生提供了幾種治療選擇

examples.sentence: A proper diet can be a good [cure] for fatigue.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 合理的飲食可以是疲勞的良好療法

meanings.meaning_en_US: To relieve a person or animal of the symptoms of a disease or condition.

examples.sentence: Doctors strive to [cure] their patients.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 醫生力求治癒他們的病人

examples.sentence: The new medicine may [cure] the illness.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這種新藥可能治癒這種疾病

examples.sentence: He believes he can [cure] his allergies.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他相信他可以治癒他的過敏症

meanings.meaning_en_US: To consume with fire; to cause to be consumed by fire.

examples.sentence: Be careful not to [burn] yourself while cooking.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 煮飯時小心不要燙到自己。

examples.sentence: The candle will [burn] for hours.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這根蠟燭會燃燒幾個小時。

examples.sentence: She saw the paper [burn] quickly in the flame.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她看到紙張在火焰中迅速燃燒。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An area or division, especially part of a country or the world having definable characteristics but not always fixed boundaries.

examples.sentence: The Amazon rainforest is a crucial [region] for biodiversity.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 亞馬遜雨林是生物多樣性的關鍵區域。

examples.sentence: This [region] is known for its rich history and culture.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個區域以其豐富的歷史和文化而聞名。

examples.sentence: The climate varies significantly in different [regions].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 不同區域的氣候差異顯著。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A large bird of prey known for its keen eyesight and soaring flight.

examples.sentence: The [eagle] soared high above the mountains.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 鷹在山脈上空高高翱翔。

examples.sentence: An [eagle] is a symbol of freedom and power.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 鷹是一種自由和力量的象徵。

examples.sentence: Watching an [eagle] catch its prey is an incredible sight.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 看到鷹捕捉獵物是一個不可思議的景象。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To express warm approval or admiration of.

examples.sentence: They [praised] her for her hard work.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們讚美她的努力工作

examples.sentence: He was [praised] by the teacher for his performance.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他因為表現而受到老師的讚美

examples.sentence: She always [praises] her teammates.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她總是讚美她的隊友

meanings.meaning_en_US: The expression of approval or admiration.

examples.sentence: His [praise] was much appreciated.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的讚美之詞受到很大感激

examples.sentence: She received a lot of [praise] for her artwork.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的藝術作品獲得了很多讚美

examples.sentence: Words of [praise] can motivate others.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 讚美的話語能激勵他人

meanings.meaning_en_US: A unit of measurement equal to 1,760 yards or about 1.609 kilometers.

examples.sentence: The city is five [miles] away from here.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這座城市距離這裡五英里。

examples.sentence: He ran a [mile] in under six minutes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在六分鐘內跑了英里。

examples.sentence: There is a park every few [miles] along the road.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 沿著這條路每幾英里就有一個公園。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A substance used in the diagnosis, treatment, or prevention of a disease.

examples.sentence: The doctor prescribed a new [drug] for her illness.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 醫生為她的疾病開了一種新藥物。

examples.sentence: He was caught with illegal [drugs] in his possession.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他因持有非法藥物而被逮捕。

examples.sentence: The [drug] has shown promising results in clinical trials.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這種藥物在臨床試驗中顯示出了良好的結果。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A type of product manufactured by a particular company under a particular name.

examples.sentence: This [brand] is known for its quality.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個品牌以其品質聞名

examples.sentence: The company launched a new [brand] of shoes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該公司推出一新的鞋子品牌

examples.sentence: She prefers this [brand] over others.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她偏好這個品牌而非其他

meanings.meaning_en_US: A tough elastic polymer used for various products.

examples.sentence: The [rubber] is used in tires and erasers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 橡膠用於輪胎和橡皮擦。

examples.sentence: She bought a [rubber] band to hold the papers together.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她買了一條橡皮筋來把文件綁在一起。

examples.sentence: The [rubber] duck floated on the water.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 橡膠鴨在水上漂浮。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A sweet spread made from fruit and sugar, used on bread or toast.

examples.sentence: I love to spread [jam] on my toast.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我喜歡在我的吐司上抹果醬。

examples.sentence: She made homemade strawberry [jam].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她做了自製的草莓果醬。

examples.sentence: They serve peanut butter and [jam] sandwiches.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們提供花生醬和果醬三明治。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To refer to something briefly and without going into detail.

examples.sentence: Please [mention] your concerns during the meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請在會議中提到你的關切

examples.sentence: I forgot to [mention] the new policy.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我忘記提到新政策

examples.sentence: He did not [mention] his past experience.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他沒有提到他的過去經歷

meanings.meaning_en_US: The process of making something better.

examples.sentence: There has been a noticeable [improvement] in her performance.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的表現有明顯的改善。

examples.sentence: The project aims for continuous [improvement] in efficiency.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個項目旨在持續改善效率。

examples.sentence: We need to assess the [improvement] in our strategy.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們需要評估我們策略的改善情況。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A thick, sauce made from tomatoes and used as a condiment.

examples.sentence: I like to use [ketchup] on my fries.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我喜歡在薯條上加番茄醬。

examples.sentence: Ketchup is a popular condiment with burgers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 番茄醬是漢堡的熱門調味料。

examples.sentence: He added [ketchup] to his sandwich.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在三明治上加了番茄醬。

meanings.meaning_en_US: For each; for every.

examples.sentence: The speed limit is 60 miles [per] hour.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 限速是每小時60英里。

examples.sentence: The fee is $10 [per] person.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 費用是每人10美元。

examples.sentence: You need to water the plants once [per] week.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你需要每週澆水一次。

meanings.meaning_en_US: In the company of; accompanied by.

examples.sentence: I went to the movies [with] my friends.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我和朋友一起去看電影。

examples.sentence: She is studying [with] a professor.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她和一位教授一起學習。

examples.sentence: You can come [with] us if you like.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 如果你願意，可以和我們一起來。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To go to see someone or something for a short time.

examples.sentence: I will [visit] my grandmother this weekend.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我這個週末要去拜訪奶奶

examples.sentence: She decided to [visit] the museum.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她決定去造訪博物館

examples.sentence: Can we [visit] the new cafe later?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們可以稍後去造訪新咖啡館嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: To cause or allow (something, especially food or drink) to pass down the throat.

examples.sentence: Make sure to chew your food well before you swallow.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 確保在吞下之前將食物咀嚼得很好。

examples.sentence: He struggled to swallow the large pill.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他很難吞下那顆大藥丸。

examples.sentence: The fish can swallow its prey whole.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那條魚可以整個吞下獵物。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An area of land, typically for the purpose of gardening or recreation.

examples.sentence: The kids played in the front [yard].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 孩子們在前院裡玩。

examples.sentence: She has a beautiful garden in her [yard].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的院子裡有一個美麗的花園。

examples.sentence: They built a swing in the [yard].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們在院子裡搭建了一個秋千。
